messages.subject: Re: .RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] all hail peewee :) WAS Doing too little?
messages.msgSnippet: ... cool indeed. :)  we are currently enjoying exposing our kids to all the shows/movies/books we (dh & i) loved as kids...marveling at how timelessly fabulous
messages.messageBody:
>Kirby, yesterday, "When did we get Peewee's Playhouse!?"
>"Yesterday."
>"COOL!"

cool indeed. :) we are currently enjoying exposing our kids to all the
shows/movies/books we (dh & i) loved as kids...marveling at how
timelessly fabulous they are, including the first few seasons of peewee's
playhouse. peewee in particular is so amusing to watch as an adult, i'm
finding. much like sesame street and the simpsons, there are so many
levels of interest involved...it's brilliant!

lisa

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
